page.title: 14JOHN F. KENNEDY SCHOOL I.
page.content:
HEADMASTER: G.M. STOTHARD. DEPUTY HEADS: MR. LEY ; MRS. HARRISON.
JOHN F. KENNEDY SCHOOL IS THE ONLY CATHOLIC SCHOOL IN HEMEL HEMPSTEAD, WITH PUPILS AGED FROM 11 TO 18. THE SCHOOL WAS OPENED IN 1967 AS THE FIRST ALL ABILITY SCHOOL IN HEMEL HEMPSTEAD.
THE PUPILS HAVE ACHIEVED A VERY HIGH STANDARD IN ALL PUBLIC EXAMINATIONS WHICH INCLUDE CSE,GCE & 16 PLUS.
JOHN F. KENNEDY HAS ABOUT 850 PUPILS FROM MANY SURROUNDING AREAS AS FAR AWAY AS LUTON AS WELL AS FROM HEMEL.
THERE IS A TEACHING STAFF OF ABOUT FIFTY COMING FROM AS FAR AS CRICKLEWOOD. BECAUSE OF EXPANSION IT'S ACCOMODATION HAS BEEN GRADUALLY INCREASED AND EXTENDED.
